rules_text:
Until your next turn, another target permanent you control gains protection from all colors. [i](This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything that's white, blue, black, red, or green.)[/i]
Search your library for a colorless card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Put a 10/10 colorless creature token named Worldcleanser with indestructible onto the battlefield, then exile all colored permanents.
special_text:
[+2]: Until your next turn, another target permanent you control gains protection from all colors.
[-3]: Search your library for a colorless card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. 
[-12]: Put a 10/10 colorless creature token named Worldcleanser with indestructible onto the battlefield, then exile all colored permanents.
